video.name: BUFFALO CHICKPEA SALAD SANDWICH | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
BUFFALO CHICKPEA SALAD SANDWICH

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/buffalo-chickpea-salad-sandwich/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

This Buffalo Chickpea Salad Sandwich is the ultimate vegan lunch sandwich filled with a spicy chickpea salad that has all the flavors of buffalo wings and a crunchy quick slaw! 100% plant-based & perfect for a summer picnic or as an office lunch!

This Buffalo Chickpea Salad Sandwich is savory, satisfying, creamy, crunchy, and slightly spicy – the perfect kind of thing to whip up as a healthy weekday lunch. Simple yet fun and it all comes together in 20 minutes.

******MORE FROM THE BLOG******

#buffalochickpea #vegansandwich #chickpeasandwich #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 15 oz can chickpeas or 1.5 cups cooked
1-2 teaspoons white vinegar or apple cider vinegar
2 teaspoons oil or melted vegan butter
2 cups of finely chopped cabbage or you can also use lettuce
bread slices as needed or you can also assemble this in tacos (burritos, or wraps.)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add the chickpeas and mash until most of the chickpeas are mashed but there's still some texture.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add the chickpeas and mash until most of the chickpeas are mashed but there's still some texture.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the bell pepper, celery, and onion and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the bell pepper, celery, and onion and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the sauce ingredients until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the sauce ingredients until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add sauce to the chickpea mixture along with salt and garlic powder and toss well. Taste and adjust salt and heat. If you like more heat, you can add more hot sauce or you can add 1/4 teaspoon of cayenne.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add sauce to the chickpea mixture along with salt and garlic powder and toss well. Taste and adjust salt and heat. If you like more heat, you can add more hot sauce or you can add 1/4 teaspoon of cayenne.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the slaw, add the slaw ingredients to a bowl and toss well. Taste and adjust by adding more ranch if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the slaw, add the slaw ingredients to a bowl and toss well. Taste and adjust by adding more ranch if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble by placing some greens like baby spinach or some peppery greens on one bread slice.
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble by placing some greens like baby spinach or some peppery greens on one bread slice.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add a good helping of the chickpea mash then top it with the slaw and add another bread slice.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add a good helping of the chickpea mash then top it with the slaw and add another bread slice.
